events.message: We have received John Doe's application for the software engineer position and the resume looks promising with strong programming skills.
The application was categorized under Engineering after reviewing keywords such as software development, programming, and devops experience.
Recruiter Sarah has been assigned to manage the hiring process for this engineering candidate to proceed with next steps.
Initial phone screening was conducted; the candidate demonstrated solid knowledge of software frameworks and cloud technologies.
Candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm for the technical interview and the role's responsibilities.
Technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 2 PM with the senior engineering team to assess coding and problem-solving skills.
